name: rbutr-browser-extension
description: Get bias-proofed! Use rbutr to Follow inter-website disagreements and keep yourself more fully informed.
author: rbutr Community

scripts.sass: node-sass src/scss/main.scss --output src/css --source-map-embed --source-map-contents && node-sass src/scss/platforms.scss --output src/css --source-map-embed --source-map-contents
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:html && yarn run lint:style && yarn run lint:js
scripts.build: yarn run lint && yarn run sass && yarn run zip
